Description.Name: MRB Authorization Upgrade Available
Description.Details: Darius approaches you during your lunch break with an excited look. "Commander! It has finally happened, we got an offer for upgraded authorization from the MRB."He hands his techpad over, an incoming message already open. "Dear Commander {COMMANDER.Name} of {COMPANY.CompanyName}, It is with great pleasure the MRB can inform You that Your company is now able to request an increased contract classification authorization within the MRB contract bidding system. For a small nominal fee, the MRB will provide one of its most experienced assessors; who after a routine assessment of your company's capabilities will allow the requisition of an upgraded official MRB Epsilon Authorization Console. This upgrade will allow Your company to take on even harder contracts, opening the path to even more glory and fortunes! We hope to hear from you shortly, [TEMPLATE_Generic_Insert Name of Friendly Local MRB Representative]." Darius waits impatiently until you finish reading the message. "What are we waiting for, let's request the assessment at once. Imagine the increased amount of fame I..*cough* we will achieve once it is known we can handle Epsilon-level contracts!" You shake your head at the almost-bouncing Darius, but decided to look into the matter later in the day. Information: The access to Superheavy Mission contracts can now be unlocked. These missions are considerably harder as they will include one or more Superheavy 'Mechs or vehicles, which each can weigh up to 200 tons, depending on your current difficulty rating.

Description.Name: <color=#A8A8A8>[Delay 180 days]</color> Pass on the opportunity for now.
Nothing happens, temporary delay the decision for 6 months.
Description.Details:
<color=#A8A8A8>Shaking your head, you deliver your decision.</color> "We'll wait for now. Perhaps we will consider it again once we are more prepared."

<color=#A8A8A8>Though disappointed, Darius goes to fetch some food before sitting down next to you.</color>

<color=#35dde0>[Event has been paused for 180 days]</color>

Description.Name: Send a request for a MRB Assessor
Assessment
Description.Details: <color=#A8A8A8>You smile at Darius before replying.</color> "You know, Darius, why not? I am always ready for more challenges. Let's get the Assessor over here as soon as we can.
